appearances.title: MS NOW Reports : MSNOW : January 1, 2026 10:00am-11:01am PST
appearances.snippet: i think it's especially important at a time when you have folks like tommy tuberville and randy fine in the republican party calling for the purge of all muslims in the country to have a figure like mamdani rise and have it be so joyful and celebrated in the greatest city in the world. and i think it also tells the story of what he'll definitely be able to succeed on, because i think the policy battles are going to be tough. but as a cultural figure and a leader of the city, a mascot of new york city, he's going to be amazing. and i think we saw a little bit of that with the storytelling of getting sworn in in the old city hall subway, so i'm sure we'll see a lot more of that. i know a lot of new yorkers feel heard and represented by him and his campaign, especially young people as well. >> i think right now we're hearing new york state of mind, billy joel playing over the loudspeaker there at the at the inauguration is it's going to be getting underway soon. reena mamdani made a lot of campaign promises, most of them around affordability. so at the end of the day, is his success ult

appearances.title: Katy Tur Reports : MSNOW : January 16, 2026 11:00am-1:00pm PST
appearances.snippet: senator tommy tuberville says what trump has been saying is not a threat to greenland. speaker mike johnson says the u.s. is not at war with greenland, and senator john kennedy insists trump will not invade. will will not invade greenland. that it would be, quote, weapons grade stupid. and he says trump is not stupid. but trump is adamant that the u.s. needs the territory and that all options to get it appear to still be on the table. >> i may put a tariff on countries if they don't go along with greenland, because we need greenland for national security. we are going to do something on greenland, whether they like it or not. because if we don't do it, russia or china will take over greenland. if we don't do it the easy way, we're going to do it the hard way. >> okay. the easy way or the hard way? the hard way. doesn't appear to be diplomacy or buying something, but some will say that trump's talk is still just bluster, a way to force denmark into selling greenland, which officials there say they will not do, buying or taking. there are now more than a handful of republ
